attributes.action: MAKE KENNETH MATHIESON DALGLISH A SIR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make kenny dalglish a sir for his work for charity (brest cancer and  hillsborough) and his services to football (celtic, liverpool, blackburn rovers, newcastle united, and scotland)

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
